alert.note: Alert for Coshocton; Guernsey; Muskingum; Tuscarawas (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 1:02PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...AN AREA OF STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN GUERNSEY... COSHOCTON...MUSKINGUM AND SOUTHWESTERN TUSCARAWAS COUNTIES THROUGH 145 PM EDT... At 101 PM EDT, an area of strong thunderstorms near Dresden, or 12 miles southwest of Coshocton, was moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Zanesville, New Philadelphia, Dover, Coshocton, Cambridge, Newcomerstown, New Concord, West Lafayette, Sugarcreek, South Zanesville, North Zanesville, and Dresden. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 in Ohio between mile markers 145 and 178. Interstate 77 in Ohio between mile markers 46 and 83. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
